title: Post Detail Screen
description: Build a full post detail view with comments section, add comment form, and share functionality for a complete social media experience.
instructions:
Implement a comprehensive post detail screen:

1. Display the full post with all content and images
2. Show comments list with pagination
3. Add comment input form at the bottom
4. Implement real-time comment adding with optimistic updates
5. Add share functionality with platform share sheet
6. Handle loading and error states for comments
7. Support replying to comments (nested comments)

hints.text: Use a CustomScrollView with SliverList for the comments to allow the post header to scroll with the content
Keep the comment input in a bottomSheet or fixed at the bottom using Column with Expanded for the scroll view
For nested comments, use a recursive widget or flat list with indentation based on reply depth

commonMistakes.mistake: Not scrolling to new comment after adding
commonMistakes.consequence: User cannot see their comment was added, especially on long comment lists
commonMistakes.correction: Use scrollController.animateTo() to scroll to the new comment position after adding
Show share sheet immediately and handle any errors gracefully in the background
